text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ParticipationFunction where concept is-a _AuthorizedParticipationFunction

name: AuthorizedParticipationFunction
title: AuthorizedParticipationFunction
description: This code is used to specify the exact function an actor is authorized to have in a service in all necessary detail.
